service

Class StockMarketSimulation

  • java.lang.Object
    • service.StockMarketSimulation
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, IStockMarketSimulation

    public class StockMarketSimulation
extends java.lang.Object
implements IStockMarketSimulation, java.io.Serializable
    This Class simulates the Stock market where in it keep a record of the stocks of different companies. It also provides various methods to perform various operations such as buying stocks and get current price of the stoock at a certain date. This class is a singleton class that will be shared by everyone.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
